body.name: Nookums Paci-Plushies Buddies - Harmony The Horse Pacifier Holder - Adapts to Name Brand Pacifiers, Suitable for All Ages, Plush Toy Includes Detachable Pacifier
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 59 mins
features: STOP LOST PACIFIERS - Paci-Plushies make finding baby's pacifier a snap! Eliminate the stress of searching for lost pacifiers

EASILY REPLACE PACIFIERS - Each Paci-Plushie includes a Nookums Pacifier that detaches from the animal for easy replacement & sanitation. Use our Nookums Pacifier or swap it out for your own. Paci-Plushies Pacifier Holders have a flexible Hug Ring that attaches to a variety of baby's favorite pacifiers and is compatible with: Mam, Avent, NUK and many more. Please Note: Paci-Plushies are compatible with most but not all pacifiers. Paci-Plushies work best with pacifiers that have a button shield

HELPS WITH FINE MOTOR SKILLS - Paci-Plushies Plush Toys make it easier for babies to independently maneuver the pacifier at a younger age. Our huggable designs are sized for little hands and textured for touch and exploration

GROWS WITH BABY - Turn any Paci-Plushies Plush Toy into a Chillable Teether with our Chillies Teether Add-On. Chillies Teethers are filled with purified water and store in the fridge. These lightweight chillables help to soothe tender gums and boo-boos for children of all ages. Attach your favorite Paci-Plushie and baby will enjoy the cool teether while keeping their fingers warm with their favorite plush (sold separately)
HELPS WITH TRANSITION - When baby outgrows the pacifier, the Paci-Plushies toy helps to ease the transition. Pacifier detaches for replacement & sanitation. Plush is machine washable
body.description: Nookums Paci-Plushie Harmony the Horse If you have a pacifier loving baby you've probably been through the painful experience of frantically searching for your baby's pacifier while your little love screams out in desperation for their lost soother. Search no more, there's a better way! Attaching Nookums Paci-Plushies to your baby's pacifier will allow you and your child to locate the pacifier fast and efficiently.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nookums Paci-Plushie Harmony the Horse If you have a pacifier loving baby you've probably been through the painful experience of frantically searching for your baby's pacifier while your little love screams out in desperation for their lost soother. Search no more, there's a better way! Attaching Nookums Paci-Plushies to your baby's pacifier will allow you and your child to locate the pacifier fast and efficiently. Compatible With: Mam Pacifiers Avent Classic, Soothie and Ultra Pacifiers NUK Orthodontic and Space Pacifiers BIBS Natural Rubber Pacifier and Nuby Classic Oval Pacifiers Dr. Brown's Advantage Pacifiers Amazon Brand Mama Bear Pacifiers Chicco PhysioForma Pacifier Ulubulu Expression Pacifiers

Nookums Paci-Plushies Multi-Functional and Convenient Eliminate the stress of searching for lost pacifiers with our universal pacifier holder. Paci-Plushies Pacifier Holders keep the pacifier close to baby and make it easier for babies to grasp onto and independently maneuver the pacifier. Paci-Plushies have a flexible Hug Ring that attaches to a variety of baby's favorite pacifiers. Helps with fine motor skills Paci-Plushies Toys make it easy for babies to independently maneuver the pacifier. Our huggable designs are sized for little hands and textured for touch and exploration. Safe, easy to clean, and with so many options to choose from Nookums One-Piece Pacifiers are Made with 100% Medical-Grade Silicone. BPA free, Latex free, Phthalate free. Pacifier is Easy to Clean and Dishwasher Safe. All Paci-Plushies animals are machine washable. Made with 100% Polyester. With options to choose from a moose, fox, dog, lion, elephant, panda, horse, cow, chicken, rhino, pig, giraffe, unicorn, penguin, and a lobster as a buddy as well as a pink, purple, blue and green for a pacifier color.

One of two ways to connect nookums To be compatible with more pacifiers, Nookums Paci-Plushies have two points of possible connections. The first possible connection can be at the base of the Hug Ring, where it attaches to the plushie. The Hug Ring has an opening where parts of specific pacifiers can be inserted.

The second way of connection The second possible connection is made by stretching the Hug Ring over the base and handle of the pacifier. The Nookums Hug Ring is very flexible and can be stretched to fit a variety of pacifiers.

Nookums Paci-Plushie Nookums Paci-Plushie Chillies Teethers Nookums Shakies Nookums Pacifiers Description Eliminate the stress of searching for lost pacifiers with our universal pacifier holder. Paci-Plushies Pacifier Holders keep the pacifier close to baby and make it easier for babies to grasp onto and independently maneuver the pacifier. Sized for little hands, textured for touch and exploration. Our design provides 6 different textured areas to explore. Raised ridges help soothe and massage irritable gums. Chillies Teethers are filled with purified water and can be stored in fridge. Stop Lost Pacifiers - Paci-Plushies make finding baby's pacifier a snap! Eliminate the stress of searching for lost pacifiers. Two in one rattle and comfort object. Pacifiers are Made with Medical-Grade Silicone BPA free, Latex free, Phthalate free. Pacifier is Easy to Clean and Dishwasher Safe. Material Pacifier is silicone. They're BPA and Phthalate free. The animal is polyester. Silicone Pacifier is silicone. They're BPA and Phthalate free. The animal is polyester. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This was backup
reviews.reviewText: 11 months old and we just had to order a replacement, this is the perfect lovey and bink. All the hospital stays and visits. All the siblings playing and days out, my little one has held strong onto this. We only needed to replace because I had to break the 1st because of a hospital stay. It's sturdy, easy to clean, easy to replace just the nipple ect. Our alligator has been a life saver

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Upsides and downsides
reviews.reviewText: The Nookums Paci-Plushie is a game-changer for parents and their little ones. This ingenious product combines a pacifier holder with a plush toy, creating a soothing and entertaining experience for babies. The soft, huggable plush toy not only keeps the pacifier within easy reach but also provides a cuddly companion for comfort. The compatibility with most pacifier brands is a big plus, giving parents flexibility.One notable feature is the detachable design, allowing parents to swap out the pacifier for cleaning or replacement. This also means that as your child grows and transitions away from using a pacifier, the plushie remains a beloved toy. The various designs and characters available cater to different tastes and preferences.However, a potential downside might be that the pacifier can sometimes come loose from the plushie, requiring vigilant monitoring. Additionally, while the detachable feature is handy, it is not compatible with all pacifiers and it might lead to accidental detachment if not secured properly.In conclusion, the Nookums Paci-Plushie is a creative solution that combines functionality and comfort, providing a soothing companion for babies and easing parents' worries about misplaced pacifiers. Despite some minor drawbacks, its innovative design and versatility make it a must-have for parents seeking both convenience and comfort for their little ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
